Operation 'connections' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, not_actionable. Original summary 'connections' is a noun, not an action. Description is minimal and lacks context about what the operation returns and when to use it. Improved summary uses action verb 'Retrieve' and clarifies the scope. Enhanced description explains the return value structure, scope (all peers), and that no input parameters are needed, improving AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Returns an array of all peer connection statuses.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete array of all active peer connection statuses. Returns status information for each connected peer in the network. This operation does not require peer identification and provides a system-wide view of all current connections.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'connections' is a noun, not an action. Description is minimal and lacks context about what the operation returns and when to use it. Improved summary uses action verb 'Retrieve' and clarifies the scope. Enhanced description explains the return value structure, scope (all peers), and that no input parameters are needed, improving AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'connect' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is a bare verb without context. Description lacks details about required inputs (peer identifier), expected outputs (confirmation/status), and side effects (establishes connectivity). Improved version clarifies what input is needed, what is returned, and the operational effect, enabling AI agents to understand when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Initiate a connection to a specified peer.
data.description_suggestion: Initiates a new connection to a specified peer in the network. Requires the target peer identifier as input. Returns confirmation of the connection attempt including the peer identifier and connection status. The operation establishes network connectivity with the specified peer and may take time to complete depending on network conditions.
data.reasoning: Original summary is a bare verb without context. Description lacks details about required inputs (peer identifier), expected outputs (confirmation/status), and side effects (establishes connectivity). Improved version clarifies what input is needed, what is returned, and the operational effect, enabling AI agents to understand when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'disconnect' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary lacks action context and clarity. Description is incomplete - missing input requirements, output details, and side effects. Improved version specifies the required peer identifier input, confirmation response, and importantly clarifies the side effect that ongoing communications will be affected, helping AI agents understand the consequences of this operation.

data.current_description: Initiate disconnection from a specified peer.
data.description_suggestion: Initiates disconnection from a specified peer in the network. Requires the target peer identifier as input. Returns confirmation of the disconnection including the peer identifier and final connection status. This operation terminates the active connection with the specified peer and may affect any ongoing data transfers or communications with that peer.
data.reasoning: Original summary lacks action context and clarity. Description is incomplete - missing input requirements, output details, and side effects. Improved version specifies the required peer identifier input, confirmation response, and importantly clarifies the side effect that ongoing communications will be affected, helping AI agents understand the consequences of this operation.

message: Operation 'status' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is a bare noun without action context. Description lacks clarity on required inputs and what specific status information is returned. Improved version specifies the peer identifier requirement, details the status information returned (state, metrics, timestamp), and provides guidance on when to use this operation, enhancing AI agent interpretability and decision-making.

data.current_description: Retrieves the connection status for a specified peer.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve connection status for a peer
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current connection status for a specified peer. Requires the target peer identifier as input. Returns detailed status information including connection state (connected/disconnected), connection quality metrics, and timestamp of last status update. Use this operation to check the real-time connectivity state of a specific peer.
data.reasoning: Original summary is a bare noun without action context. Description lacks clarity on required inputs and what specific status information is returned. Improved version specifies the peer identifier requirement, details the status information returned (state, metrics, timestamp), and provides guidance on when to use this operation, enhancing AI agent interpretability and decision-making.
